item.title: About
item.description: I am a Physics undergraduate student at IIT Kharagpur. I have interest in Programming, Open Source, Physics and Gadgets. My other name is Aditya Vikram Singh. FAQs Why xypnox? Why Blag? How is this blag made? This blag is made through a static site generator called hugo. The theme I am currently using is called blag-theme. You can find my website/portfolio at xypnox.com You can reach me here: Github Twitter Telegram <== text me here Instagram Facebook You can also email me at xypnox @ gmail .
